sec.div: Culture and preparation of Fusarium sporotrichioides
sec.p: F. sporotrichioides Microbial Type Culture Collection 1894[ 40] was used as the test organism and was obtained from the Department of Microbiology, Defence Food Research Laboratory, Mysore. The fungus was purified and harvested at 37°C on potato dextrose broth (PDB). The spores concentration was adjusted to 5 × 10 5 CFU/mL using a hemocytometer.
